name: Real Speed Drift: Fast Car
description:
Real Speed Drift: Fast Car is the best illegal street racing game as the user will compete with other street racers as the user will have the ultimate racing challenge. The main challenge is to drive that car in the highway and avoid highway traffic. Use the best racing game simulation and avoid city traffic that is coming from the opposite side and race the car in streets and roads of the city.
Features:
.Real car racing game in google
.Racer need for speed only
.Drift car with fast speed
.Control left or right to avoid coming car
.HD graphics
.Excited background
